data.title: 21 Noteworthy Broadcasting Companies in Maryland
data.meta_description: Explore 21 of Maryland's prominent broadcasting companies, including Sinclair Broadcast Group and TV One, providing news, sports, and targeted entertainment across diverse platforms.
data.text:
The broadcasting industry in Maryland is dynamic and versatile, comprising of diversified media companies that cater to various audience groups. These companies offer a range of services including local news, sports coverage, digital content, and television broadcasting over multiple platforms. Varying in size, some are affiliated with major broadcast networks, while others focus on specific demographic groups offering targeted entertainment and lifestyle programming. In addition to conventional broadcasting, many are adopting digital and streaming platforms, adapting to evolving viewer trends and the ever-increasing demand for accessible, on-the-go content.

Top 21 broadcasting companies in Maryland

1. Sinclair Broadcast Group

Website: sbgi.net

Headquarters: Cockeysville, Maryland, United States

Founded: 1986

Headcount: 5001-10000

Latest funding type: Ipo

LinkedIn

Sinclair Broadcast Group, Inc. is a diversified media company and leading provider of local news and sports. The Company owns, operates and/or provides services to 185 television stations in 86 markets; is a leading local news provider in the country; owns multiple national networks; and has TV stations affiliated with all the major broadcast networks and owns and/or operates 21 RSN brands. Sinclairâs content is delivered via multiple-platforms, including over-the-air, multi-channel video program distributors, and digital and streaming platforms.

2. Urban One, Inc

Website: urban1.com

Headquarters: Silver Spring, Maryland, United States

Founded: 1980

Headcount: 1001-5000

Latest funding type: Ipo

LinkedIn

Urban1.com is a media company focused on representing and engaging with the Black community. They offer a range of brands including radio stations, TV channels, digital platforms, and live events. With a strong emphasis on diversity and relevance, Urban1.com provides a unique platform for connecting with the urban audience.

3. TV One

Website: tvone.tv

Headquarters: Silver Spring, Maryland, United States

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

TV One is a media company that offers a wide range of entertainment programming for African American adults. They feature comedy, entertainment, reality shows, and lifestyle programming. TV One represents and celebrates the culture and stories of the African American community.

4. Antietam Broadband

Website: antietamcable.com

Headquarters: Hagerstown, Maryland, United States

Founded: 1966

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

Antietam Cable Television, Inc. is a company that offers a wide range of products and services related to cable television. They provide access to various channels, including sports, news, movies, and more. Additionally, they offer DVDs and Blu-rays of events such as the Alsatia Mummers' Parade and Historic Homes. Customers can browse their catalog and make purchases online.

5. LTN Global

Website: ltnglobal.com

Headquarters: Columbia, Maryland, United States

Founded: 2006

Headcount: 51-200

Latest funding type: Series Unknown

LinkedIn

LTN Global is a global broadcast video solutions company that offers transformative content experiences. They provide live video management, monitoring and control, and automated versioning to reach cross-platform audiences. Their solutions include linear video integration, addressable advertising, and IP multicast transport.

6. Fox 5 Dc

Website: fox5dc.com

Headquarters: Bethesda, Maryland, United States

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

FOX 5 DC is a television station that offers news, sports, and entertainment programming to the Washington metropolitan area. It is an owned-and-operated TV station of the Fox Broadcasting Company. The station is located in Washington, D.C. and serves the entire Washington metropolitan area, including Northern Virginia, Maryland, and the Martinsburg, West Virginia area.

7. Wmar-tv

Website: wmar2news.com

Headquarters: Baltimore, Maryland, United States

Founded: 1947

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

WMAR-2 News is a media company that provides local, national, and international news coverage. They offer a wide range of news topics including politics, business, sports, entertainment, and weather.

8. Wboc-tv

Website: wboc.com

Headquarters: Salisbury, Maryland, United States

Founded: 1954

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

WBOC.com is a news website and video center that provides the latest local, national, and international news updates. It offers live streaming of news broadcasts, weather forecasts, sports coverage, and other programming. The website also features articles on various topics, including politics, health, business, and agriculture.

9. Cunningham Broadcasting Corporation/The CW Baltimore Television

Website: cunninghambroadcasting.com

Headquarters: Baltimore, Maryland, United States

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

Cunningham Broadcasting Corporation is an independent television broadcast company that owns and operates 20 television stations across the United States.

10. WBAL NewsRadio 1090 and FM 101.5

Website: wbal.com

Headquarters: Baltimore, Maryland, United States

Founded: 1925

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

WBAL.com is a news and radio station website that provides information about local and national news, weather, sports, and events. It is the flagship radio station for the Baltimore Ravens, the Baltimore Orioles, and Navy Football.

11. The Public Service Network

Website: publicservicenetwork.com

Headquarters: Annapolis, Maryland, United States

Founded: 2004

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

Public Service Network is a company that specializes in the distribution and marketing of public service announcements (PSAs). They offer a range of services including traditional TV and radio broadcasting, digital video campaigns, grassroots marketing, and campaign analytics.

12. WJHU - Johns Hopkins Student Radio

Website: wjhuradio.org

Headquarters: Baltimore, Maryland, United States

Founded: 1945

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

wjhuradio.org is a website for a radio station that offers music, news, and entertainment to its listeners.

13. Marquee Broadcasting

Website: marqueemedia.tv

Headquarters: Brookeville, Maryland, United States

Founded: 2013

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

Marquee Broadcasting Inc. is a family-owned group of television and radio stations focusing on local communities and delivering trusted local news, entertainment, and weather. Affiliated with major networks like NBC, CBS, FOX, and ABC, as well as the CW, MyNetworkTV, and MeTV.

14. Patrick Communications

Website: patcomm.com

Headquarters: Elkridge, Maryland, United States

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

Patrick Communications is a media brokerage and investment banking firm based in Columbia, MD, specializing in television and radio sales, telecom, and tower brokerage. Their services also include fair market and asset appraisals.

15. Hearst Radio, INC.

Website: 98online.com

Headquarters: Baltimore, Maryland, United States

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

98online.com seems to be a radio station and music news website featuring events, contests, and music videos related to rock music.

16. NBC Sports Washington

Website: nbcsportswashington.com

Headquarters: Bethesda, Maryland, United States

Founded: 1984

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

NBC Sports Washington is a media and entertainment company offering coverage of local sports teams to the Washington D.C. area.

17. Lawson

Website: lawsonarch.com

Headquarters: Bethesda, Maryland, United States

Headcount: 1-10

LinkedIn

Lawson is an architecture firm specializing in complex broadcast projects for the media industry.

18. Sportsworx

Website: sportsworxinc.com

Headquarters: Rockville, Maryland, United States

Founded: 2004

Headcount: 1-10

LinkedIn

Sportsworx, Inc. is a sports marketing agency that specializes in sports property representation, advertising and marketing consulting services, corporate sales programs through athletes, sporting events, and sports teams, and radio programming and production.

19. Wafy-Key 103.1

Website: key103radio.com

Headquarters: Frederick, Maryland, United States

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

Key 103 Radio is a radio station that provides music, entertainment, and radio shows to its listeners.

20. Mentzer Media

Website: mentzermedia.com

Headquarters: Towson, Maryland, United States

Founded: 1991

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

Mentzer Media is a research, planning and placement company specializing in political, issue, and corporate advertising. With over 30 years of experience and a track record of placing over $1 billion in media buys, we provide a meticulous analysis of media schedules, real-time ad alerts, and customizable reports. Our expertise lies in identifying prime audiences, effective media, and precise timing to capture attention. We are committed to delivering results and ensuring accountability from media outlets.

21. Lyons Broadcast PR

Website: lyonspr.com

Headquarters: Kensington, Maryland, United States

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

Lyons PR is a team of broadcast media and video production experts that provides broadcast media relations and video/multimedia production services to a wide range of clients including top brands, trade associations, nonprofits and federal agencies.

Want to find more broadcasting companies?

If you want to find more companies that ...provide dynamic content across platforms, catering to diverse audiences you can do so with Inven. This list was built with Inven and there are hundreds of companies like these globally.

With Inven you'll also get to know the company's:

Ownership: Which of these are private equity backed? Which are family-owned?

Contact data: Who are the owners and CEO's? What are their emails and phone numbers?

Financials: How do these companies perform financially? What are their revenues and profit margins?

...and a lot more!
